article_title: The 4 Most Overlooked Health Care Stories Of 2013

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act (ACA) dominated media coverage in 2013. And rightly so. But here are four overlooked health care headlines may prove just as important over time.
article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.
